_exec_summary.SummaryText: hlorine system emergency scrubber system was installed to further reduce and minimize the likelihood of an off-site consequence. Expansion pots are in place to further increase safety related to a potential chlorine system incident. In addition, automatic shutoff valves are provided throughout the systems and are interlocked with the sensors and alarms to shutdown the operations in the event of a chlorine detection.
